title: Bull Market Rotations From Tech-Driven Mega-Companies
itunes:title: Bull Market Rotations From Tech-Driven Mega-Companies
description:
Bloomberg News Senior Editor Mike Regan discusses the bull market rotating away from tech-driven mega-companies. Bloomberg News Aerospace Reporter Julie Johnsson talks about Boeing landing a crucial Max deal from Ryanair after its grounding. Bloomberg News New York Bureau Chief Shelly Banjo shares her insight on why going after big tech is one thing global leaders agree on. Rupali Limaye, Associate Director for Behavioral Research for the Institute for Vaccine Safety at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, walks through strategies for overcoming barriers to vaccine acceptance. And we Drive to the Close with Ryan Kelley, Portfolio Manager at Hennessy Cornerstone Mid Cap 30 Fund.

Host: Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
